alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Thomas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:37PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN CHERRY...ROCK... LOUP...BROWN...WEST CENTRAL HOLT...NORTH CENTRAL CUSTER...BLAINE... NORTHEASTERN THOMAS AND SOUTHWESTERN KEYA PAHA COUNTIES THROUGH 845 PM CDT... At 737 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Johnstown to 12 miles north of Elsmere to 7 miles northeast of Thedford. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ainsworth, Bassett, Brewster, Stuart, Long Pine, Newport, Johnstown, Purdum, Rose, Elsmere, Milburn, Milburn Diversion Dam State Wildlife Management Area, Hofeld Lake, Fox Bayou, Raven, Almeria Meadow State Wildlife Management Area, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Hawley Flats, Twin Lakes State Wildlife Management Area and Willow Lake State Wildlife Management Area. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 135 and 208. Highway 20 between mile markers 223 and 284. Highway 83 between mile markers 157 and 163. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in North Platte.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Brown; Custer; Eastern Cherry; Holt; Keya Paha; Loup; Rock; Thomas
